headline: Niskanen Center Examines American Electric Power Company, Inc. (AEP)’s Place In The US Transmission Grid
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is among 10 Best Performing Electrical Infrastructure Stocks in 2025. On December 5, 2025, American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP)’s place in the US transmission grid was thoroughly examined by Rachel Levine, a Senior Transmission Policy Analyst for the Climate and Energy team at the Niskanen Center. The analyst […]
